nio/LinkedIn.description: Create a signal for each new discussion post, given a group ID. Official [documentation](https://developer.linkedin.com/docs).

creds.title: Credentials
creds.description: Credentials to connect to LinkedIn API.

include_query.title: Include Query Field
include_query.description: Whether to include queries in request to LinkedIn.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request to LinkedIn.

lookback.title: Lookback Period
lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: How often LinkedIn is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the *polling interval* times the number of queries.

queries.title: Query Strings
queries.description: Queries to include on request to LinkedIn.

retry_interval.title: Retry Interval
retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.title: Retry Limit
retry_limit.description: Number of times to retry on a poll.

default.description: Creates a new signal for each LinkedIn Group Discussion Post. Every field in the Post will become a signal attribute.
